Discussions.Discussion_Name: Last lecture on Wednesday the 17th of July

Messages.Author: Sandro Rodriguez Garzon
Messages.Content: The last lecture will take place at Wednesday the 17th of July. There will be no lecture on the 18th of July.

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Pre-registration required for verbal exams in ST 2024

Messages.Author: Sandro Rodriguez Garzon
Messages.Content: Dear students, please pre-register at http://130.149.223.198/limesurvey/index.php/364858?lang=en until the 30th of April if you want to be examined in ST 2024. Pre-registrations after the 30th of April will not be accepted unless less than 60 students pre-registered. More information about the pre-registration and exam registration process as a whole can be found in the Syllabus slides. Best Sandro
